page.title: 09FOOTBALL CLUBS
page.content: The football club is not used very often but it is kept in good condition and the grass is cut regularly. Next to the football club there is{Weeley {Village Hall}wheremothers can take their children to play. Also the village hall gives tutorship in{music {and dancing}. Though in the area outside Weeley Heath, sports are more popular. These percentages only refer to the village and not the outlying farms. So in Weeley the village hall is the main place for people to gather and as it offers a wide range of facilities such as the{music, dancing and drama}or just a place to take one's children to play, it is considered a great place of interest in Weeley.
